description:
TokenLock.grantMinterRole(address).user (src/ckMatic.sol#54) lacks a zero-check on :
		- minter = user (src/ckMatic.sol#55)

TokenLock.withdrawTokens(address,address,uint256).user (src/ckMatic.sol#108) lacks a zero-check on :
		- (success) = user.call{value: amount}() (src/ckMatic.sol#114)
markdown:
[TokenLock.withdrawTokens(address,address,uint256).user](src/ckMatic.sol#L108) lacks a zero-check on :
		- [(success) = user.call{value: amount}()](src/ckMatic.sol#L114)

description:
Reentrancy in TokenLock.lockTokens(address,uint256,bytes) (src/ckMatic.sol#72-100):
	External calls:
	- (success) = minter.call{value: withdrawGasCost}() (src/ckMatic.sol#80)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- TokensLocked(msg.sender,address(0),msg.value,principalId) (src/ckMatic.sol#84)
markdown:
Reentrancy in [TokenLock.lockTokens(address,uint256,bytes)](src/ckMatic.sol#L72-L100):
	External calls:
	- [(success) = minter.call{value: withdrawGasCost}()](src/ckMatic.sol#L80)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- [TokensLocked(msg.sender,address(0),msg.value,principalId)](src/ckMatic.sol#L84)

description:
Reentrancy in TokenLock.lockTokens(address,uint256,bytes) (src/ckMatic.sol#72-100):
	External calls:
	- success_scope_0 = tokenContract.transferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),amount) (src/ckMatic.sol#88-92)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- TokensLocked(msg.sender,token,amount,principalId) (src/ckMatic.sol#98)
markdown:
Reentrancy in [TokenLock.lockTokens(address,uint256,bytes)](src/ckMatic.sol#L72-L100):
	External calls:
	- [success_scope_0 = tokenContract.transferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),amount)](src/ckMatic.sol#L88-L92)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- [TokensLocked(msg.sender,token,amount,principalId)](src/ckMatic.sol#L98)
